title: Can’t Close My Legs - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   C*nnilingus   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   M*sturbation   Misunderstandings   Outdoor Interc**rse   Pregnancy   R*pe   Second Chance   Soldiers
author: 啊肥阿
description:
In the previous life, Xu Ruan was arranged by the head of the family and married Ji Cheng, a soldier in the same village. She listened to the nonsense of her good sister, misunderstood Ji Cheng’s personality, divorced him and fled the village, and lived in a big city.

In this life, she went back to the night she married Ji Cheng and had a drink, and saw that the swelling after Ji Cheng took off his underwear was huge. She had done this thing in her previous life and couldn’t close her legs all day long.

She felt that she had misunderstood her past life. He looked handsome, lived a good life, and had a particularly strong stamina, so she didn’t want her husband who was so drenched in water. In this life, she must make up for the lack of husband and wife life in the previous life, and continue to live well with Ji Cheng in this life.>
